name.ca: Volume Booster - Sound Booster for Chrome
name.ta: Sound Booster - Sound Booster for Chrome

short.ar,bg: Customise music by volume booster tool. Allows to increase the volume of your audio and video files. Sound booster. Music Enhancer
short.am: Control volume of any tab, Make the all sounds of your tabs much louder. Up to 600 % sound boost.
short.bn: Control volume of any tab, Make the all sounds of your tabs much louder. Up to 600 % sound boost. Volume Controller
short.ca,es,es_419: Personaliza la música con la herramienta de aumento de volumen. Permite aumentar el volumen de sus archivos de audio y video.…
short.cs,et,kn,ru,ta,te,th,tr,uk,vi,zh_CN,zh_T: Customise music by volume booster tool. Allows to increase the volume of your audio and video files. Sound booster
short.da: Forøg lydstyrken til maksimal effekt, og kontroller den på enhver fane.
short.de: Passen Sie Musik mit dem Volume Booster-Tool an. Ermöglicht das Erhöhen der Lautstärke Ihrer Audio- und Videodateien.…
short.el: Control volume of tab, Make the sounds of your tabs much louder. Up to 600 % sound boost. Music Enhancer. Volume Booster and volume…
short.en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,hu: Customize music file by volume booster tool. Allow you to increase the volume of your audio and video files
short.fa: Increase volume to max effect and control the it of any tab.
short.fi: Lisää äänenvoimakkuutta maksimitehosteeseen ja hallitse sen välilehteä.
short.fil: Taasan ang lakas ng tunog sa max na epekto at makontrol ito ng anumang tab.
short.fr: Personnalisez la musique par l'outil d'amplification du volume. Permet d'augmenter le volume de vos fichiers audio et vidéo.…
short.gu,he,hr,lt,ml,mr,ms,sv,sw: Unleash the power of sound on your browser! Increase volume to max level and control the it of any tab.
short.hi,lv,ro: Sound Booster increase the volume level in a headphones and speakers. Volume booster and volume control for music. Volume Controller
short.id: Lepaskan kekuatan suara di browser Anda! Tingkatkan volume ke level maksimal dan kendalikan tab apa pun.
short.it: Scatena la potenza del suono sul tuo browser! Aumenta il volume al massimo livello e controllalo da qualsiasi scheda.
short.ja: ブラウザでサウンドのパワーを解き放ちましょう！ 音量を最大レベルまで上げて、任意のタブの音量を制御します。
short.ko: 브라우저에서 사운드의 힘을 발휘하십시오! 볼륨을 최대 수준으로 높이고 모든 탭에서 제어하십시오.
short.nl: Ontketen de kracht van geluid in uw browser! Verhoog het volume tot het maximale niveau en regel het van elk tabblad.
short.no: Slipp løs kraften i lyden i nettleseren din! Øk volumet til maks nivå og kontroller det på en hvilken som helst kategori.
short.pl: Uwolnij moc dźwięku w swojej przeglądarce! Zwiększ głośność do maksymalnego poziomu i kontroluj go w dowolnej zakładce.
short.pt_BR,pt_PT: Personalize a música pela ferramenta de reforço de volume. Permite aumentar o volume de seus arquivos de áudio e vídeo.…
short.sk: Uvoľnite vo svojom prehliadači silu zvuku! Zvýšte hlasitosť na maximálnu úroveň a ovládajte ju na ľubovoľnej karte.
short.sl: Sprostite moč zvoka v svojem brskalniku! Povečajte glasnost na največjo raven in jo nadzirajte na katerem koli zavihku.
short.sr: Ослободите снагу звука у свом прегледачу! Повећајте јачину звука на максимални ниво и контролишите је на било којој картици.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Volume Booster , your passport to an elevated auditory journey! Are you tired of straining to hear your favorite music or struggling to catch every word in videos? Say farewell to low-volume frustrations and embrace a world of sound, amplified to your liking.

🔊 Amplify Your Experience:
Volume Booster Plus empowers you to boost audio up to a staggering 500%, ensuring every beat and word resonates powerfully. Elevate your sound to new heights and immerse yourself in a sonic realm that captivates your senses.

✨ Simplicity at its Finest:
Our intuitive interface makes adjusting volume levels a breeze with just a single click. No more navigating through complicated settings—experience seamless volume control with a sleek slider designed for effortless use.

🚀 Unleash the Full Potential:
Why settle for average sound quality? With Volume Booster Plus, revel in the richness of your favorite music and videos by tweaking the audio just the way you like. Customize your sound using our built-in equalizer, genre presets, and bass boost feature.

🌟 Your Audio, Your Rules:
Tailor your auditory experience with finesse. From bass enhancements to vocal amplifications, take advantage of our 32Hz-16kHz equalizer, stereo and mono toggles, stereo pan adjustments, and personalized presets. Craft an audio atmosphere that aligns perfectly with your preferences.

🎧 Works Anywhere, Anytime:
No matter where your online adventures take you—be it YouTube, Twitch, Facebook, or Soundcloud—Volume Booster Plus stands by your side. Immerse yourself in crystal-clear audio on all your favorite platforms, and embrace the joy of exceptional sound.

🔒 Safety First, Always:
Your safety is our priority. Volume Booster Plus ensures a secure audio-enhancing experience. Our blue rectangle icon indicates audio enhancement, and one simple keystroke (F11 on Windows or Ctrl+Cmd+F on Mac) maximizes your viewing experience.

⚙️ Customize Your Audio Setup:
Fine-tune your audio setup to perfection. Experiment with the 32Hz-16kHz equalizer, toggle between stereo and mono, adjust the stereo pan, and save personalized presets. Let Volume Booster Plus elevate your audio setup to create a captivating, immersive soundstage.

💯 Love Volume Booster Plus?
Rate us with 5 stars and spread the word. Your support is invaluable as we continue to enhance your audio experience.

Ready to redefine your auditory world? Download Volume Booster Plus now and let the music play louder, the videos speak clearer, and your audio experience be unparalleled!
